page.title: Diplomacy Extension
page.descr: Text for Diplomacy Extension by Cycrow
page.t: Select station to sooth relations with
Select station to gain immunity with
Select factory to arrange a contract
[author]%s[/author]Your spy, %s, has been caught while trying to steal \033B%s\033X from \033B%s\033X.
[author]%s[/author]I have failed attempting to steal \033B%s\033X from %s
Send an agent to sooth the ship/station relations in a sector
This task will adjust the relations of all ships/stations in the area to remove as a foe. Requires friendly notoriety with the owner race
Send an agent to gain diplomatic immunity from notoriety changes
This task will prevent dynamic notoriety changes from effecting the targeted race
Send an agent to negotiate a trade with a factory

This task will negotiate a trade with a factory for a certain number of wares. These wares will be delivered to your Headquarters automatically as they produce until the contract is met.\nThe larger the contract the cheaper each unit will cost.
Send an agent to steal wares from a factory
This task will send an agent to attempt to steal wares from a factory and deliver them to your headquarters, hopefully without getting caught.
